mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ORD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDDATE, ORD_PRDSELCODE AS ORDPRDSELCODE, PRD_NAME AS PRDNAME, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRDPRICE, PRF_FILNAME AS PRFFILNAME, PRF_LOCATION AS PRFLOCATION, ORD_PRDCTECODE AS ORDPRDCTECODE, ORD_PRDCODE AS ORDPRDCODE FROM ORD INNER JOIN PRD ON ORD_PRDSELCODE = PRD_SELCODE AND ORD_PRDCODE = PRD_CODE AND ORD_PRDCTECODE = PRD_CTECODE INNER JOIN PRF ON PRD_CODE = PRF_PRDCODE AND PRD_SELCODE = PRF_PRDSELCODE AND PRF_PRDCTECODE = PRD_CTECODE WHERE ORD_PRDSELCODE = #{selCode} ORDER BY ORDDATE DESC
